use-geocoding.coordinates-not-found: No coordinates found for this address.

errors.start-date-after-end-date: Start date must be before end date.
errors.invalid-name: Name must be between 2 and 50 characters and can only include letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes.
errors.invalid-date-time: The game cannot be scheduled in the past.
errors.invalid-price: Price must be a positive number.
errors.invalid-max-participants: Maximum number of players must be a positive number.

errors.email-already-exists: This email is already in use
errors.invalid-first-name: First name must contain between 2 and 50 characters and can only include letters, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes.
errors.invalid-last-name: Last name must contain between 2 and 50 characters and can only include letters, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes.
errors.invalid-pseudo: Username must contain between 3 and 15 characters and can only include letters, numbers, hyphens (-) and underscores (_).
errors.invalid-date-of-birth: You must be at least 18 years old to register.
errors.invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.invalid-password: Password must contain at least 8 characters, include a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, a number and a special character (among '$ ! % * ? &').

index.title: Airsoft Companion - Home
index.description: Airsoft Companion is a platform for airsoft enthusiasts. Find games, meet players and build your reputation.

hero-banner.subtitle:
Find games,
Meet players,
Build your reputation!

infos.description1: Whether you're a player or an organizer, Airsoft Companion is your ideal ally for managing and finding airsoft games. With a single click, access events near you and specialized stores. Publish your games with ease, without worrying about payments and registrations - we take care of everything! And the best part? It's 100% free!
infos.title2: What are the benefits for organizers?
infos.description2: Tired of wasting time managing registrations? Airsoft Companion takes care of it for you! Publish your listing instantly and let the platform handle the rest. Problematic players are automatically filtered, and entrance fee payments are secured directly via the application. By validating registrations after payment, significantly reduce absenteeism.
infos.title3: What are the benefits for Players?
infos.description3: No more endless searches! Access all games and stores near you with one click. Easily manage your entrance fee and view history of your past and upcoming events. Create your profile, display your equipment and join teams. Collect badges to show your commitment within the community.

errors.user-already-joined: You have already joined this game.
errors.game-in-progress-or-finished: Action not allowed because the game is already in progress or finished.
errors.game-has-participants: Action not allowed because the game has participants.

contact.message-sent: We will respond as soon as possible.
